## Topic frequency

```{r}
dat <- readRDS("result/data_slda.RDS")
dat$n <- rep(1, nrow(dat))
agg <- aggregate(n ~ year + topic, dat, FUN = sum)
ggplot(agg, aes(year, n, color = topic)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(topic))
```
